Title: Film: NCPA Flashback — Bhuvan Shome
Content: NCPA Flashback series presents Mrinal Sen’s 1969 film Bhuvan Shome. Our protagonist is a lonely widower, but a proud old man and a disciplinarian. A day’s exposure to a host of alien situations deepen
